head.title: Brand Consultants Aim to Bridge Ocean

identified-content.org: Weiss Stagliano O'Malley Hogan International Brand Architecture
identified-content.object.title: Advertising (Times Column)

hedline.hl1: Brand Consultants Aim to Bridge Ocean

abstract.p: Weiss Stagliano Partners and O'Malley & Hogan are opening brand consulting company named Weiss Stagliano O'Malley Hogan International Brand Architecture, with offices in Dublin and New York and more planned (S)

block.p: Weiss Stagliano Partners in New York and O'Malley & Hogan in Dublin are opening a brand consulting company named Weiss Stagliano O'Malley Hogan International Brand Architecture. The consultancy will open with two offices, in Dublin and New York, with more planned. There will be 67 employees working for clients like Fathom.

Weiss Stagliano Partners in New York and O'Malley & Hogan in Dublin are opening a brand consulting company named Weiss Stagliano O'Malley Hogan International Brand Architecture. The consultancy will open with two offices, in Dublin and New York, with more planned. There will be 67 employees working for clients like Fathom.

The principals of Weiss Stagliano O'Malley Hogan, who will have the titles of directors, will be the principals of the two agencies: Declan Hogan, 46; Damian O'Malley, 44; Adam Stagliano, 44; and Marty Weiss, 46.
